name: Hell`s Little Story 2
description:
Hells Little Story 2 is a platformer in its best manifestations. A mixture of different game mechanics, shooting, attempts to escape from monsters and achievements - in this game there is all of this.
The protagonist tries to get out of hell, and then from even more macabre places, and his faithful bow, lots of gold coins and merchants will help him. But don't think that everything will be so easy -
monsters, traps and intricate corridors will not give even a moment of rest.
